MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the ML10 postcode area of Strathaven. This is causing flickering and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.48am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9.24am on Thursday 28th January 2021
